Description: Target is totally protected from all natural light (includes glare, sunburn, and temporary blinding; but not lightning); +10 to all RRs vs light (electricity); -10 to elemental electricity attacks.
As Resist Light, except protects against natural heat to 200 F and modifies spells involving heat by 10.
As Resist Light, except protects against natural cold to -20 F and modifies spells involving cold by 10.
As Resist Light, except all beings within 10'R of target are protected.
As Resist Heat, except all beings within 10'R of target are protected.
As Resist Cold, except all beings within 10'R of target are protected.
As Resist Light , except protects against all natural light and electricity and modifies spells involving light (electricity) by 20.
As Lightarmor, except protects against heat.
As Lightarmor, except protects against cold.
As Lightarmor, except protects all beings within 10'R.
As Heatarmor, except protects all beings within 10'R.
As Coldarmor, except protects all beings within 10'R.

As Lightarmor, except it also decreases all electrical concussion hits (e.g., from shock bolts and lightning bolts) by half, and decreases electrical critical strikes by one level (e.g., â€˜A's are ignored, 'B's become 'A's, 'C's become 'B's, etc.)
As Lightning Armor, except fire and heat spells are affected (e.g., fire bolts and fireballs).
As Lightning Armor, except cold and ice spells are affected (e.g., ice bolts and coldballs).
As Lightarmor, except as many targets as the caster's level can be affected.
As Heatarmor, except as many targets as the caster's level can be affected.
As Coldarmor , except as many targets as the caster's level can be affected.
Acts as Lightning Armor, Fire Armor, and Ice Armor all at the same time.
